name: Tempest-Sun Shielding
summary: You transform unrealized spell energy into a protective shield.
description:
You transform unrealized spell energy into a protective shield. If you’re a spontaneous spellcaster, expend a spell slot; if you’re a prepared spellcaster, expend a spell prepared in a spell slot. Reduce the triggering damage by an amount equal to four times the level of the expended slot or spell.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: You or an ally within 30 feet takes damage.
